item.title: Hormel’s stock boosted by revenue beat, though challenges lie ahead with turkeys and nuts
item.description: The company said it continues to “recover from the snack nuts supply disruption” that impacted Planters nuts.

item.title: Oil prices boosted after Trump moves to end Venezuela crude deal
item.description: Oil futures rose Thursday morning, finding support a day after President Trump said he was revoking a license issued by the Biden administration that ...

item.title: Three catalysts have driven S&P 500 corrections since 1964. Here’s what could spark one now.
item.description: Piper Sandler’s Michael Kantrowitz has dug into big corrections since 1964 and finds they all need a catalyst. Here’s what he sees coming in 2025.

item.title: ‘She’s still waiting by the phone’: My grandmother gave her life savings to a man she met online. What now?
item.description: “Up until the moment she was scammed, we considered her the wealthy one in our family.”

item.title: Trump’s tariffs unleashed a wave of uncertainty among investors. Here’s what you should do next.
item.description: Processing our uncertainty — or rather, being comfortable with it — can help us sharpen our problem-solving capabilities.
